html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2023-12272023-12-08TC
ActCanada Shipping Act, 2001
SubjectRegulations Amending the Vessel Operation Restriction Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the VESSEL OPERATION RESTRICTION REGULATIONS in order to (1) amend the prohibition for operating a power-driven vessel or a vessel driven by electrical propulsion by removing the reference to waters in public parks and controlled access bodies of water; (2) add federal fishing licences to the exemption for a person who holds a provincial fishing permit and whose livelihood depends on fishing; (3) remove the technical signage guidelines and incorporate them by reference to an existing Transport Canada publication; (4) introduce a new schedule that specifically provides for restrictions on wake surfing; (5) introduce 21 new restrictions to six bodies of water in response to requests made by local authorities; (6) designate port enforcement officers employed by the Windsor Port Authority as enforcement officers; and (7) correct the geographic coordinates and the name and/or the description for three bodies of water.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0274 Publication Date: 2023-12-20
AttachmentsAttachment
